h2. Storage Buckets

Storage Buckets provide you with a secure, distributed storage solution using the Ceph Object Gateway S3 API. [Click here|http://ceph.com/docs/master/radosgw/s3/] for the API documentation.

{{html:
	<div ng-controller="StorageController">
	    <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-cloak>
	    <tr>
	      <th>Bucket</th>
	      <th>Access Key</th>
	      <th>Size</th>
	    </tr>
	    <tbody>
	      <tr ng-repeat="storage in storages">
	        <td><a href="{[ storage.url ]}">{[ storage.url ]}</a></td>
	        <td>{[ storage.accesskey ]}</td>
	        <td>{[ storage.size ]} bytes</td>
	      </tr>
	    </tbody>
	  </table>
	</div>
}}
